# E60HL-230020/D - Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel

## Solicitation Number: WS4006758308
## Publication Date: 2023-12-21
## Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-25T14:00:00

The solicitation is a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the supply of Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards. The delivery locations are in various provinces and territories in Canada, on an as-and-when-requested basis.

### Tender Description
This RFSO cancels and supersedes the previous RFSO number E60HL-230020/A (DOC4006944752) dated May 12 2023, and RFSO number E60HL-230020/B (DOC4132763310) dated August 4, 2023. The tender is for National Master Standing Offers (NMSO) for Diesel Fuel, Automotive Gasoline, and Heating Fuel Oil, with delivery to various locations in Canada from February 1, 2024 to August 31, 2025.

### Procurement Method
The procurement method is competitive, open bidding, with the lowest price being the selection criteria. The Request for Standing Offers is part of a tendering process, not a request for formal bids. The solicitation will be conducted in both official languages, with documents available in both English and French.

### Trade Agreements
The solicitation respects Canada's trade agreements, including the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### End User Entities
The end users are various government departments, including the Correctional Service of Canada, the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food, and the Department of the Environment, among others.

### Tendering Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Notice URL
The notice URL is available on the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18344282?extsite=MTgzNDQyODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Note:** The solicitation is now closed, and the tender status is expired
